plugins.name: AppwriteAuth
plugins.overview: Appwrite-backed authentication for Jellyfin with admin invite/reset tools
plugins.description: AppwriteAuth delegates authentication to Appwrite while keeping all Jellyfin URLs unchanged. Includes a modern Vue 3 admin interface for managing users, sending invites, resetting passwords, and configuring email templates. Supports SMTP or Appwrite Messaging with customizable branding.

versions.changelog:
Initial release with Vue 3 admin interface:
- Appwrite authentication integration with automatic user provisioning
- Modern Vue 3 + TypeScript admin interface (155 KB gzipped)
- Email provider support (SMTP or Appwrite Messaging)
- Admin tools: Invite users, reset passwords, test email configuration
- Customizable branding (logo, colors, email templates)
- Dark mode support matching Jellyfin theme
- Toast notifications for user feedback
- Requires Custom Tabs plugin for navigation integration
